templates.content: To ship your products as soon as possible, we immediately begin processing your order as soon as it is placed. Once orders are submitted, we cannot edit, cancel, or change your address.  If your order has been dispatched, it must be processed as a return once received.
templates.name: Cancel / edit order

templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!
templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount

templates.content: Thank you for your interest! We have an Affiliate Program that you can learn more about and apply for here: https://iliabeauty.com/pages/affiliates
templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program

templates.content:
Most ILIA Beauty products are made/manufactured in the U.S. except for the following products:

- Made in Canada: Balmy Gloss Tinted Lip Oil, In Frame Brow Gel, Skin Rewind Complexion Stick
- Made in China: All Brushes, Lip Sketch Hydrating Crayon (contents made in Italy; assembled in China)
- Made in Germany: In Full Micro-Trip Brow Pencil
- Made in Italy: Blue Light Mist, Color Haze, Fullest Volumizing Mascara, Lightshift Cream Highlighter, Lip Sketch Hydrating Crayon, Liquid Light Highlighting Serum, Liquid Powder Eye Tint, Limitless Lash Mascara, Sunshift Cream Bronzer
- Made in Korea: Clean Line Gel Liner, Clean Line Liquid Liner
templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?

templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://iliabeauty.com/pages/rewards
templates.name: Rewards / referral

templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/iliabeauty/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/ILIAbeauty/
templates.name: Social media

templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://support.iliabeauty.com/en-US/what-is-your-returnexchange-policy-732130
templates.name: Return policy

templates.content: You can start your return process here: https://returns.iliabeauty.com/#/
templates.name: Where can I start my return?

templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you!
templates.name: Phone Support

templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://iliabeauty.com/pages/find-a-store
templates.name: Store location / retailer

templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at wholesale@iliabeauty.com. Our team is happy to chat.
templates.name: Wholesale inquiries

templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://iliabeauty.com/pages/order-tracking
templates.name: Order status/order tracking

templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $50.00. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?
templates.name: Free shipping

templates.content: You can take our short quiz to find the shade that matches you perfectly! Feel free to check it out here: https://iliabeauty.com/pages/find-my-shade
templates.name: Find my shade Quiz

templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-3 business days and we usually ship via USPS or UPS SurePost. Once shipped, it will take 4-6 business days for domestic orders and 10-15 business days for international orders.
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@iliabeauty.com or submit in inquiry here: https://support.iliabeauty.com/en-US/contact Our team is happy to help!
templates.name: Customer support
